application.name: WenWen (问问)
application.description: A Chinese language learning assistant iOS application built with SwiftUI
application.overview: WenWen is an interactive Chinese learning application that provides conversational practice and learning assistance. The app features a chat-based interface where users can interact with an AI assistant in Chinese, with support for pinyin display to aid in pronunciation and character recognition.
